entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
